OneNote for iPhone at a glance

[1] Record Audio [image1] Easily record lectures, leave an audio note, or capture musical inspiration.

[2] Inking [image2] Draw quickly with your finger or a stylus on the iPhone

[3] Office Lens [image3] Use Office Lens to snap a picture of a business card and drop it straight into OneNote, contact information and all.
